thread.title: Shia LaBeouf charged with public intoxication in Texas
thread.title_full: Shia LaBeouf charged with public intoxication in Texas - Times Union

author: timesunion.com
title: Shia LaBeouf charged with public intoxication in Texas
text:
Photo: Richard Shotwell, Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP Image 1 of / 1   1 FILE - In this Sept. 15, 2015, file photo, Actor Shia LaBeouf attends a premiere for "Man Down" on day 6 of the Toronto International Film Festival at Roy Thomson Hall in Toronto. The actor was arrested and charged with public intoxication after an incident in Austin, Texas. Jail records show LaBeouf was booked Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, night into the Travis County Jail and released on his own recognizance. (Photo by Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP, File)
Photo: Richard Shotwell, Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP FILE - In this Sept. 15, 2015, file photo, Actor Shia LaBeouf... Shia LaBeouf charged with public intoxication in Texas 1  /  1 Back to Gallery AUSTIN, Texas (AP) â€” Actor Shia LaBeouf has been arrested and charged with public intoxication after an incident in Austin, Texas.
Jail records show LaBeouf was booked Friday night into the Travis County Jail and released on his own recognizance. No attorney was listed on the record.
He was arrested in the city's Sixth Street entertainment district. The Austin City Limits music festival is taking place there through Sunday.
Police have not responded to a request from The Associated Press for additional details. His publicist did not immediately respond to a request for comment on the arrest.
